texture.description: The namespace and ID of the sprite sheet to replace the default one with. [Here's what the vanilla sprite sheet looks like.](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/status_bar_texture)
texture.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the sprite sheet to replace the default one with. [Here's what the vanilla sprite sheet looks like.](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/status_bar_texture)

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/status_bar_texture)

Replaces the status bar textures (health, hunger, air, experience, etc.) with a specified sprite sheet.

Type ID: `origins:status_bar_texture`
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/status_bar_texture)

Replaces the status bar textures (health, hunger, air, experience, etc.) with a specified sprite sheet.

Type ID: `origins:status_bar_texture`
